content: Updated October 14, 2018 11:36:00 For investors, it was a week where there was nowhere to hide except under the doona clutching a pile of cash and some gold ingots. Even Friday's recovery on Wall Street seemed to lack much conviction. For the optimists it rep… [+9519 chars]
description: Last week's big sell-off on global markets was broad and swift. Is it another sign of the longest bull run in modern history is on its last legs?
title: Dead cat bounce or buying opportunity? Global markets steady after a brutal week
